inputs.context: All digital products are non-refundable once the download has started. Physical products can be returned within 14 days. Gift cards are non-refundable.

outputs.response: Since you purchased within the eligible timeframe, you are eligible to request a refund for your digital game purchase.

checks.name: Context Contradiction
checks.evidence: Output suggests eligibility despite 'non-refundable' in context | Context: "All digital products are non-refundable once the download has started. Physical." | Output: "...urchased within the eligible timeframe, you are eligible to request..."

checks.name: No False Certainty
checks.evidence: Confident claim without acknowledging conditions: "you are eligible"
checks.details: Output confidence may exceed evidence support

checks.name: Preserve Tensions
checks.evidence: Context contains conflicting rules not reflected in output
checks.details: Output may have collapsed policy tensions

checks.name: No Premature Compression
checks.evidence: Context has ~3 points, output has 1 sentences
